    bucketResource.addPropertyOverride("AnalyticsConfigurations", {
      Id: "config1",
      StorageClassAnalysis: {
        dataExport: {
          OutputSchemaVersion: "1",
          Destination: {
            Format: "html",
            BucketArn: "arn:aws:s3:::" + bucketName // use tokens freely
          }
        }
      }
    });
